text: The year 1672 in music involved some significant events. ==Events== *March – Jean-Baptiste Lully quarrels with his regular collaborator, the playwright Molière,Jan Clarke, "From the Palais-Royal to the Guénégaud: Life after Molière". Accessed 28 February 2013 who brings in Marc-Antoine Charpentier to replace him. *December 30 – John Banister begins Europe’s first major commercial public concert series at Whitefriars in the City of London. *Arcangelo Corelli visits Paris, where he incurs the jealousy of Jean-Baptiste Lully.Penny Cyclopedia of the Society for the Diffusion of Useful Knowledge (1837), vol 8, p468.
